common.tagline: Open Source AI Character Viewer & Sharing

hero.title: Your AI Character
hero.description: View, share, and chat with AI characters. From CharX viewer to P2P-based CharX sharing, everything is free and open source.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.description: An all-in-one toolkit for AI character enthusiasts

charxViewer.title: CharX Viewer
charxViewer.description: Check out character cards, lorebooks, and assets from CharX files. Everything runs right in your browser.

p2pSharing.title: P2P CharX Sharing
p2pSharing.description: Share character files directly with friends using P2P. No server uploads, instant transfers!

connect.title: P2P Multi-Character Chat
connect.description: Set up chat sessions with multiple AI characters. Invite friends and watch characters interact with each other.

dragDrop.title: Drag & Drop
dragDrop.description: Just drop your .charx files to see what's inside instantly

cardInfo.title: All Character Info at a Glance
cardInfo.description: View character details, lorebooks, image assets and more

clientSide.title: 100% Local Processing
clientSide.description: Your files never leave your browser. Total privacy guaranteed!

qrCode.title: QR Code & Share Links
qrCode.description: Generate QR codes and links for easy mobile transfers

webrtc.title: WebRTC Direct Transfer
webrtc.description: Files go straight between browsers. No server storage.

password.title: Password Protection
password.description: Protect your shares with a password if you want

privacy.title: 100% Local Processing
privacy.description: View CharX files right in your browser. Your data never leaves your device.

fast.title: Direct P2P Connection
fast.description: Share files and chat with friends directly. No servers in between!

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: All code is public. Contribute, customize, and make it your own.

ready.title: Ready to Get Started?
ready.description: Explore your character files with our privacy-first viewer.

connectShowcase.title: Connect Your AI with Others
connectShowcase.description: Set up a chat room with your AI character and invite friends. Watch different AIs chat in real-time. It's gonna be fun!

realtime.title: P2P Chat
realtime.description: Direct browser connection. Chat with friends without any servers.

aiPowered.title: AI Auto-Reply
aiPowered.description: Each character replies with their own personality

multiParty.title: Up to 8 People
multiParty.description: Share a QR code or link to invite friends

charx.title: CharX Viewer
charx.subtitle: Check out character cards, lorebooks, and assets. Runs right in your browser!

upload.title: Upload CharX File
upload.description: Drag and drop a .charx file or click to browse
upload.browseMultiple: or click to browse (multiple files OK)
upload.unsupportedFile: Unsupported file: {names}. Only .charx files work here.
upload.unsupportedFiles: Unsupported files: {names}. Only .charx files work here.
upload.realmPlaceholder: Paste RisuRealm URL or character ID...
upload.realmHint: Works with realm.risuai.net URLs or character UUIDs

realmError.INVALID_UUID: That RisuRealm ID or URL doesn't look right
realmError.INVALID_CHARX: Couldn't find that character on RisuRealm. Check the ID?
realmError.FILE_TOO_LARGE: File is too big ({size}). Try downloading and uploading manually.
realmError.DOWNLOAD_FAILED: Couldn't download from RisuRealm. Try again?

upload.demoHint: Load a sample character to explore the viewer

files.title: Files
files.dropMore: Drop more .charx files or click to add

errorBoundary.title: Oops, something went wrong
errorBoundary.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please refresh the page.

export.title: Save Character to Database
export.description: Save this character and lorebook locally so you can access them in chat.

character.title: Character
character.description: Character card data including name, description, personality, and messages.

lorebook.title: Lorebook
lorebook.description: Lorebook entries will be saved for context during chats.
lorebook.noLorebook: No lorebook in this character file.

export.info: Once saved, you can start chatting from the Chat page.

infoMessages.databaseReady: Database ready! You can save now.

success.title: Saved!
success.description: {name} has been saved to your database.

error.title: Couldn't save
error.description: Something went wrong while saving. Try again?
error.databaseNotReady: Database isn't ready yet. Wait a moment and try again.
error.databaseInitFailed: Couldn't start the database. Refresh the page and try again.

charx.filesExcluded: {count} files excluded due to size limit (>50MB):

notFound.heading: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

generic.title: Oops, something went wrong
generic.description: An unexpected error occurred. Try again or head back home.

charx.title: CharX Viewer Error
charx.description: Something went wrong loading the viewer. The file might be corrupted or there's a browser compatibility issue.

footer.description: Open-source AI character platform. View, share, and chat with AI characters.

p2p.title: P2P CharX Sharing
p2p.subtitle: Share character files directly with friends. P2P means no server in between.
p2p.privacyNote: Files transfer directly between browsers via WebRTC. Nothing gets stored on servers.
p2p.confirmSubtitle: Review your file and set a password if you want.
p2p.passwordHint: Leave empty to share without password protection.
p2p.sharingSubtitle: Keep this tab open. Share the link below to let others download.
p2p.stopSharingDescription: All active downloads will be cut off.
p2p.sharingWarning: Sharing will disconnect if you leave or refresh. Keep this tab open.

download.title: Download CharX File
download.connectionFailed: Couldn't connect to the uploader. They might have closed their browser.
download.notFound: Share link not found or expired
download.notFoundDescription: The file you're looking for isn't available anymore. The uploader might have stopped sharing.
download.charxDescription: Save this character and lorebook to your database with one click.
download.troubleshooting: Taking too long? The uploader might be behind a firewall or closed their browser.
download.sharePrompt: Want to share CharX files too?

leftPanel.deleteCharacter: Delete "{name}"? This will also delete all related chats.

centerPanel.selectCharacter: Pick a character and chat to get started
centerPanel.createFromLeft: Or create a new character from the left panel
centerPanel.configureApiKey: Set up your Gemini API key to start chatting.
centerPanel.clearAllMessages: Clear all messages in this chat?

rightPanel.selectCharacter: Select a character to see details
rightPanel.deleteCharacter: Delete "{name}"? All related chats will be deleted too. This can't be undone.

editor.createPersonaDesc: Create a persona to represent yourself in chats.
editor.createCharacterDesc: Create a new character to chat with.
editor.descriptionCharacter: A brief description of your character
editor.firstMessagePlaceholder: The first message your character will send
editor.personalityPersona: Describe yourself, your interests, how you communicate...
editor.scenarioPlaceholder: The setting or context for conversations
editor.exampleDialoguePlaceholder: Example conversations to set the tone...

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Set up your API settings. Everything is stored locally.
settings.safetyDescription: Set up content safety filters. By default, all filters are off for unrestricted roleplay.

meta.title: P2P Multi-Character Chat
meta.description: Create a session where AI characters can chat with each other

connect.title: P2P Multi-Character Chat
connect.subtitle: Chat with multiple AI characters together. P2P means no servers in between.

upload.title: Upload CharX File
upload.description: Drop a .charx file or click to select

photo.dropDescription: Drop an image or click to select. AI will generate a character from it.
photo.invalidType: Please select an image file (PNG, JPG, WebP, or GIF)
photo.contextHint: Add hints to guide character generation
photo.noApiKey: Please set up your Gemini API key in Settings first.
photo.apiKeyDescription: To generate characters from photos, set up your Gemini API key in Settings.

lobby.title: Waiting Room
lobby.hostDescription: Share the link below to invite others
lobby.guestDescription: Waiting for the host to start
lobby.needMoreParticipants: Need at least 2 people to start

join.title: Join Session
join.subtitle: Pick a character to join with

status.connectedInfo: You're ready to connect P2P sessions

errors.noPeer: Network connection failed. Refresh the page and try again.
errors.sessionFullDescription: This session has reached the max number of people.
errors.connectionFailedDescription: Couldn't connect to the session. The host might have left or there's a network issue.

meta.title: How It Works | OpenTamago
meta.description: Learn how to use CharX Viewer, P2P Share, and P2P Multi-Character Chat

hero.title: How It Works
hero.description: Learn how to view, share, and chat with AI characters using OpenTamago

charx.title: CharX Viewer
charx.description: Open CharX character files right in your browser. Everything is processed locally for complete privacy.

upload.title: Upload File
upload.description: Drag and drop .charx files or click to browse

view.title: View Character
view.description: See character details, personality, and greetings

lorebook.title: Explore Lorebook
lorebook.description: Browse lorebook entries with keyword triggers

assets.title: View Assets
assets.description: Check out embedded images like emotions and avatars

p2pShare.title: P2P Share
p2pShare.description: Share files directly with friends using P2P. Nothing gets stored on servers.

generate.title: Generate Link
generate.description: Get a QR code and shareable link

p2pConnect.title: P2P Multi-Character Chat
p2pConnect.description: Create multi-character chat sessions. Invite friends and let AI characters chat with each other.

select.title: Select Character
select.description: Pick from your library or create one

invite.title: Invite Friends
invite.description: Share a link or QR code to invite

ai.title: AI Replies
ai.description: Turn on auto-reply for AI responses

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: All OpenTamago features are built with privacy in mind. Your data stays on your device.

noServer.title: No Server Storage
noServer.description: Files are never uploaded to our servers. Everything happens in your browser.

encrypted.title: Encrypted Transfers
encrypted.description: P2P connections use WebRTC with built-in encryption.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: All code is public and available on GitHub.
